item.description:
Hi, Everyone! Join us for a fun evening dancing at Kadanse!

We are having an open dance social at Kadanse on Saturday, August 25 and would love to invite all of you!

At 6:30pm, we will be running an open level group class (no experience required).

Immediately following the lesson, we will be hosting a Ballroom & Latin dance party that will run until 10pm.

New to ballroom?  Don't worry...the members of this event are friendly and helpful and have all been beginners at one point:)

Join as we dance to the rhythms of Swing, Mambo, ChaCha, Foxtrot, Waltz, etc...

We would love to see you at either the lesson, the party, or both!

There is one entrance fee for the event, of $10.

Please feel free to call us directly or email here if you have any questions. We look forward to seeing you!

Thank you,

Kelley

KADANSE

781-27-DANCE

info@kadanse.com

www.kadanse.com

DIRECTIONS: From 128, take the winn street exit, #34 and follow sign toward Woburn We are at 33 Winn Street, 2nd Floor, Burlington, MA Parking & entrance are in the back of the building on Mountain Road. We are located directly across from Dunkin Donuts.

group.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group

item.name: August Dance Party!
